reviews.text:
Very friendly and quick service personnel, that pays attention to its guests.

We had chicken and moose ‚Äûkabab‚Äú, which tasted authentic and just delicious. It comes with three different sauces.

It is nice to sit outside ‚Äûon the pavement‚Äú, but the restaurant is nicely decorated also.

Restrooms are clean.
So easy to feel welcomed here!

Located at the heart of Tallinn‚Äôs old town, this beautiful restaurant offering Asian cuisine.
We were told to visit by a local who is a regular. Restaurant was very tidy, setup is simple and very polite service with fluent English speakers.
I wanted to try something spicy in taste so I opted to order a chicken vindaloo with basmati rice and we also ordered a daily special which was a lamb sauce, along rice and vegetables. Both meals were great in taste and overall it was a satisfactory experience.
Aitah Elevant !
Delicious Indian food, staff is taking care of the customers and the restaurant contributes to create a perfect atmosphere: very much recommended if you‚Äôd like to avoid the typical tourist places.

Amazing food!! The restaurant is very cozy, the staff is very friendly and the food was really good and very warmüòç

Really recommended!!
My favorite place in Tallinn for 5 years. Total hidaway even in town full of turists due to location in 2nd floor.
